body_html:
@meccaLeccaHi -- did you log out and back again (or issued other way of reloading the groups of your user)? You can validate what are you in by groups command.
Just to validate -- it works for you when run under root user, right?

body:
@meccaLeccaHi -- did you log out and back again (or issued other way of reloading the groups of your user)? You can validate what are you in by `groups` command.
Just to validate -- it works for you when run under `root` user, right?
